solution.text:
Firstly we calculate the difference of two consecutive terms
we have difference, \(d=_{k}_\)
we know the value of the first term i.e \(a_1=_{j}_\,\)and\(\, n=_{l}_\)
Using the Formula \(a_n=a_1\,+\,(n-1)*d\)
We have \(a__{l}_=_{j}_+(_{l}_-1)*_{k}_=_{{j +((l-1)*k)}}_\)

content.text:
Find the _{l}_th term of an AP
\(_{j}_,_{{j+k}}_,_{{j+(k*2)}}_\)
